headline: lululemon Bets on Footwear & Men's Category: Will it Pay Off?
summary: LULU ramps up men's apparel and launches footwear lines, betting big on growth beyond its core women's segment.

raw.headline: lululemon Bets on Footwear & Men's Category: Will it Pay Off?
raw.summary: LULU ramps up men's apparel and launches footwear lines, betting big on growth beyond its core women's segment.

headline: Ralph Lauren CEO: Tariffs a "Factor" But Focus is on Consumer
summary: Tariffs are a "factor" for Ralph Lauren, according to the fashion brand's CEO, Patrice Louvet. But Louvet says consumers are "resilient" and gravitate towards brands that they trust during times of uncertainty. Louvet joined Francine Lacqua on "The Pulse".
